scripts.install: cd ./cms/ && npm install && cd ./../frontend/ && npm install
scripts.develop: concurrently -n "CMS,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.black.bold,bgMagenta.black.bold" "cd ./cms/ && npm run develop" "wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd ./frontend/ && npm run develop"
scripts.clean: cd ./cms/ && shx rm -r ./.cache ./build && cd ./../frontend/ && gatsby clean
